thread.section_title: Renaissance Beijing Wangfujing Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Sleek, Modern but wonderful service
thread.title_full: Sleek, Modern but wonderful service - Review of Renaissance Beijing Wangfujing Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Nelleellen
title: Sleek, Modern but wonderful service
text:
We were on the club level which if you can get....absolutely pay the extra money. The staff all around top and bottom was fantastic. The concierge at the club level and in the lobby were extremely helpful. It is important to have written directions whenever you take a taxi and the staff was extremely helpful. The rooms are wonderful and the views from the Club Lounge of the Forbidden City and sunsets are stupendous.
Room Tip: I think that all of the rooms are really nice but a higher up room gives better views and Club level... See more room tips
